import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

df1 = pd.read_json("../input/news-headlines-dataset-for-sarcasm-detection/Sarcasm_Headlines_Dataset.json", lines = True)
df2 = pd.read_json("../input/news-headlines-dataset-for-sarcasm-detection/Sarcasm_Headlines_Dataset_v2.json", lines = True)

source.f42a779d:
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
train, test = train_test_split(df_new, test_size = 0.07, random_state = 42)

target = 'is_sarcastic'
nlp_column = 'headline'
train_nlp, test_nlp, nlp_pipeline, predictions = Auto_NLP(
                nlp_column, train, test, target, score_type='accuracy',
                modeltype='Classification',top_num_features=200, verbose=2,
                build_model=True)
source.c41d97aa:
from sklearn.metrics import classification_report
y_true = test[target]
y_pred = nlp_pipeline.predict(test[nlp_column])

print(classification_report(y_true, y_pred))
